name: OmniDark - Show Me a Way
description:
OmniDark is a memory game played on dark platforms.

When the player steps on a platform, the platform becomes visible for a short time. 

Keep in mind the places you pass, the obstacles and traps.

Test your patience by playing the same level over and over again.

The playable HTML version of the game is a demo with a few levels. The full game can be downloaded from the links below with Windows and Macos versions.

PS: Macos version has not been tested.
